biotools.summary: Set of functions to annotate a GRanges object with custom set of annotations. This package takes two GRanges objects (query & subject) with a common set of seqnames (i.e. chromosomes) and returns associated annotation per seqnames and rows from the query matching seqnames and rows from the subject (i.e. genes or cpg islands).

bioschemas.name: hiAnnotator
